model Order {
    operations {
        // Description of listOrders
        list listOrders(
            // Filter by price
            items.price,
            // Filter by created at
            createdAt?
        )
    }
}

===

model Order {
    operations {
        // Description of listOrders
        list listOrders(
            // Filter by price
            items.price,
            // Filter by created at
            createdAt?,
        )
    }
}
